title: Storms on the sun. Part one. Flare - surge events
creator_credit: D.G. Perrin and CSIRO. Film Unit
brief_description: Disturbances in the solar photosphere and chromosphere. Describes important types of solar phenomena, their growth and appearance on the disk and at the limb. Scientific film suitable for students of physics or astronomy.
